QuestData.Title: Trial of the Naaru: Strength
QuestData.Description: Four trials you must pass before you are deemed worthy by the naaru.$B$BThe trial of strength is divided in two. You must destroy the leader of the Coilfang Steamvaults, Warlord Kalithresh, and bring me his trident. Slay the extra-planar being known as Murmur, in the Shadow Labyrinth of Auchindoun, and bring me his essence.$B$BDo this and you will have passed the trial of strength.
QuestData.LogDescription: A'dal in Shattrath City wants you to recover Kalithresh's Trident and Murmur's Essence.$B$BThis quest must be completed in Heroic dungeon difficulty.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $N. You have passed the trial of strength.
